title: The Unbelievable story
brief_description: A small boy who is admiring a large car, is chased away when the owner returns. Later, when the car breaks down, he offers help and then tows it away, leaving the owner on the ground. When the owner gives chase, the body of the car detaches itself, leaving only the chassis.
